attributes.action: not to add chlorine to water supplies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A research team led by Professor Jouni Jaakkola of the University of Birmingham have discovered a statistically significant link between water chlorination and birth defects such as hole in the heart and cleft palates. Earlier studies have linked chlorinated water to an increased risk of stillbirth, miscarriage, birth defects and bladder cancer.

Like the air we breathe, it is everyone's right to breathe pure water that has not been tampered with by the state and made toxic.
